name: Solo Engine with Dungeon Crawler Android App
name_original: Solo Engine with Dungeon Crawler Android App
description:
This is the second edition of my Solo RPG engine. This time it includes the dungeon crawler tables from the original

This app is and always will be free. If you would like to support its development then please feel free to donate

Note: If you download this directly to your phone it will warn you about installing apps from untrusted sources. You will need to agree to that.

Note: You may have to enable third party apps by following these instructions.

  1. From a Home screen, navigate: Apps icon > Settings.
  2. Tap one of the following:
    Note Options vary depending upon device.
    a) Security
    b) Fingerprints & security
    c) Lock screen and security
  3. Perform one of the following as appropriate:
    a) Tap Unknown sources to enable or disable.
    Note Enabled when a check mark is present.
    b) Tap the Unknown sources switch to turn on On indicator or off Off indicator.
  4. Review the disclaimer then tap OK.
    You want this enabled

Note: There is no permissions warning because this app is entirely self contained and does not use anything else on your phone and does not require or use any other information and does not connect to the internet. This means that it has no way of giving any feedback so you will have to do that manually via the forum. It also means that you are not tracked or recorded in any way.
